pages.text: An effect is a helpful or harmful condition that affects an entity. $(br2)Effects can be inflicted in various ways throughout the game, including consuming $(l:brewing/brewing#potions)$(item)Potions$() and some food items, being in the range of $(l:rare/beacon)$(item)Beacons$() and $(l:rare/conduit)$(item)Conduits$(), and being attacked by or close to certain mobs.

When drinking from $(item)Milk Bucket$(), dying, being saved from death by a $(l:rare/totem_of_undying)$(item)Totem of Undying$(), or traveling through the return portal in $(l:exploring/end)$(thing)The End$(), all status effects are removed.

pages.title: Speed
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases walking speed; higher levels make the affected entity faster. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Beacon

pages.title: Slowness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases walking speed; higher levels make the affected entity slower. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Haste
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases mining and attack speed, higher levels increase the mining and attack speed. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Beacon

pages.title: Mining Fatigue
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases mining and attack speed, higher levels decrease the mining and attack speed. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Elder Guardian

pages.title: Strength
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases melee damage, higher levels make the affected entity do more melee damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Beacon

pages.title: Instant Health
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive, Negative for Undead $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Heals living entities, damages undead, higher levels heal more health and do more damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Instant Damage
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative, Positive for Undead $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Damages living entities, heals undead, higher levels do more damage and heal more health. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Jump Boost
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases jump height and reduces fall damage, higher levels make the affected entity jump higher and reduces more fall damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Beacon, Suspicious Stew

pages.title: Nausea
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Wobbles and warps the screen. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Eating a Pufferfish

pages.title: Regeneration
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Regenerates health over time, higher levels make health regenerate quicker. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Beacon, Suspicious Stew, Golden Apples, Totem of Undying

pages.title: Resistance
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Reduces damage, higher levels reduce more damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Beacon, Enchanted Golden Apple

pages.title: Fire Resistance
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Prevents the affected entity from taking damage due to $(item)Fire$(), $(item)Lava$() and other sources of fire damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Enchanted Golden Apple, Suspicious Stew, Totem of Undying

pages.title: Water Breathing
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Prevents drowning and lets the affected entity breathe underwater. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Turtle Shell

pages.title: Invisibility
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Grants invisibility (but not the item they hold or the armor they wear), and reduces other mobs' detection range for the affected entity, higher levels reduce other mobs' detection range more. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions

pages.title: Blindness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Suspicious Stew, Illusioner

pages.title: Night Vision
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Lets the player see well in darkness and underwater. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Suspicious Stew, Conduit Power

pages.title: Hunger
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases food exhaustion, higher levels cause the $(thing)Player$() to starve quicker. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Husk, Pufferfish, Rotten Flesh, Raw Chicken

pages.title: Weakness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases melee damage, higher levels decrease more melee damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Suspicious Stew

pages.title: Poison
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Inflicts damage over time (but can't kill), higher levels do more damage per second, doesn't affect undead. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows, Poisonous Potato, Pufferfish, Suspicious Stew, Spider Eye, Cave Spider, Bee

pages.title: Wither
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Inflicts damage over time (can kill), higher levels do more damage per second. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Suspicious Stew, Wither, Wither Skeleton, Wither Rose

pages.title: Health Boost
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases maximum health, higher levels give the affected entity more maximum health. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Golden Apples

pages.title: Absorption
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Adds damage absorption (additional hearts that can't be regenerated), higher levels give more absorption. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Golden Apples, Totem of Undying

pages.title: Saturation
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Restores hunger and saturation. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Suspicious Stew

pages.title: Glowing
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Neutral   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Outlines the affected entity (can be seen through blocks). $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Spectral Arrow, Bell for Villagers and Witches

pages.title: Levitation
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Neutral  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Floats the affected entity upward. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Shulker

pages.title: Luck
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Can increase chances of high-quality and more loot, higher levels increase the chances of better loot. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Bad Luck
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Can reduce chances of high-quality and more loot, higher levels reduce the chance of good loot. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)only with /effect command

pages.title: Slow Falling
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Potions, Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Conduit Power
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Conduit

pages.title: Dolphin's Grace
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive   $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Increases swimming speed. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)swimming with Dolphins

pages.title: Bad Omen
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Neutral  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Causes an $(thing)Illager$() raid to start upon entering a village, higher levels cause a more difficult raid. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Killing an Illager Captain

pages.title: Hero of the Village
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Positive  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Gives discounts on trades with $(thing)Villagers$(), and makes them throw items at the $(thing)Player$() depending on their profession. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Completing a village raid

pages.title: Darkness
pages.text: $(n)Type:$() Negative  $(br2)$(n)Effect:$() $(br)Darkens the screen. $(br2)$(n)Sources:$() $(br)Sculk Shrieker, Warden
